title: 2013학년도 봄학기 학사과정 학점인정시험 안내((Undergraduate Course Waiver Exam for Spring Semester 2013 )
content: 2013학년도 봄학기 학사과정 학점인정시험 안내 (Undergraduate Course Waiver Exam for Spring Semester 2013 ) 1. 신청기간 : 2013. 3. 4(월) ～ 3. 6(수)까지 2. 신청방법 학점인정시험 납입고지서(학과/전공사무실 및 학적팀, 교내 우리은행 비치)를 교부 받아 수 험료를 교내 우리은행에 납부한 후 영수증 및 학점인정시험 신청서를 학적팀에 제출 3. 시험기간 : 2013. 3. 7(목) ～ 3. 11(월) 【3일간】 4. 시험과목 2013학년도 봄학기 개설교과목으로 담당교수가 인정하는 교과목 (졸업연구, 개별연구, 세미나, 특강, 실험과목 등은 제외) 5. 수험료 ① 금액 : 과목당 20,000원 ② 납부장소 : 교내 우리은행 (입금 시, 학번 뒷 5자리+이름을 반드시 기재 예) 20120001 홍길동 -> 20001홍길동) ③ 납부기간 : 2013. 3. 4(월) ～ 3. 6(수)까지 6. 합격기준 학점인정시험의 합격기준은 B-등급 (환산점수 : 78점)이상이어야 하며, 이 경우, 성적 등급 은 학칙 제49조 제1항에 따라 부여함. 7. 시험시간 및 장소 : 교과목 담당교수와 학생이 협의하여 정함 8. 학점인정시험 관련 문의사항 : 학적팀 (☏ 2368 : 황아름) 2013. 2. 교 무 처 장 Undergraduate Course Waiver Exam for Spring Semester 2013 1. Application Period : March 4 (Monday), 2013 ～ March 6 (Wednesday) 2. Application Procedure Fill out the Course Waiver Exam Payment Bill provided at Department/Division offices, the Academic Registrar’s Team or Woori Bank on campus => Pay the bill at the Woori Bank => Submit the payment receipt along with the completed Application form to the Academic Registrar’s Team 3. Exam period : March 7 (Thursday), 2013 ～ March 11 (Monday) 【Three days】 4. Exams available for any courses offered during the Spring Semester 2013 with the instructor’s approval (except B.S. Thesis Research, Individual Research, Seminar, Special Lectures, Lab courses) 5. Tuition ① Amount: ￦20,000 per course ② Payment place: Woori Bank on campus (Depositor's Name : Last 5 digits of your Student ID Number + Student's name.) ③ Payment Period: March 4 (Monday), 2013 ～ March 6 (Wednesday) 6. Passing Criteria Students will receive a grade for the exam in accordance with Article 49, Section 1 of the KAIST Academic Regulation. And the students with a B- level grade or above (conversion score: 78 point or above ) will obtain credit s for (pass) the corresponding course. 7. Exam Period and Place: will be set after students consult with the corresponding course instructor 8. For further questions: the Academic Registrar’s Team (☏ 2368: Hwang Ah Reum) February 2013 Dean of Academic Affairs
